languages.text: "Даже о вас, Ваша Светлость, ходят самые странные слухи — а ведь вы лишь недавно унаследовали протекторат. Люди Кунрада Войгтвира, например, утверждают, что вы причастны к смерти почтенной Теодоры, а также обвиняют вас во многих иных грехах. Неважно, правдивы они или нет — люди слышат их. Верят им. И считают, что могут брать с вас пример".

traits.locale_text: "Даже о вас, Ваша милость, ходят самые странные слухи — а ведь вы лишь недавно унаследовали торговую империю. Люди Кунрада Войгтвира, например, утверждают, что вы причастны к смерти почтенной Теодоры, а также обвиняют вас во многих иных грехах. Неважно, правдивы они или нет — люди слышат их. Верят им. И считают, что могут брать с вас пример".

languages.text: "Even you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, are the subject of the strangest of rumours — and you have just recently inherited your protectorate. Kunrad Voigtvir's people, for instance, claim that you had a hand in the esteemed Theodora's demise and accuse you of many other misdeeds. It doesn't matter whether or not their claims are true — the people hear them. Believe them. And think that they may follow your example."
languages.original_text: "Даже о вас, Ваша Светлость, ходят самые странные слухи — а ведь вы лишь недавно унаследовали протекторат. Люди Кунрада Войгтвира, например, утверждают, что вы причастны к смерти почтенной Теодоры, а также обвиняют вас во многих иных грехах. Неважно, правдивы они или нет — люди слышат их. Верят им. И считают, что могут брать с вас пример".

traits.locale_text: "Even you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, are the subject of the strangest of rumors — and you have just recently inherited your trade empire. Kunrad Voigtvir's people, for instance, claim that you had a hand in the esteemed Theodora's demise and accuse you of many other sins. It doesn't matter whether or not their claims are true — the people hear them. Believe them. And think that they may follow your example."

It doesn't matter whether or not their claims are true — the people hear them. Believe them. And think that they may follow your example."

It doesn't matter whether or not their claims are true — the people hear them. Believe them. And think that they may follow your example."

It doesn't matter whether or not their claims are true — the people hear them. Believe them. And think that they may follow your example."

"Even you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, are the subject of the strangest of rumours — and you have just recently inherited your protectorate. Kunrad Voigtvir's people, for instance, claim that you had a hand in the esteemed Theodora's demise and accuse you of many other misdeeds. It doesn't matter whether or not their claims are true — the people hear them. Believe them. And think that they may follow your example."

languages.text: 「陛下でさえ、格好のうわさの的なのです…ましてや最近保護領を継いだばかり。例えばクンラッド・ボイトヴィルの臣民は、シオドーラの死には陛下が一枚噛んでいると主張し、他にも多くの罪で陛下を非難しています。主張の真偽は重要ではありません。人民がそういったうわさを耳にし、信じ、陛下の行いをまねてもいいと考えることが問題なのです」
languages.original_text: "Even you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, are the subject of the strangest of rumours — and you have just recently inherited your protectorate. Kunrad Voigtvir's people, for instance, claim that you had a hand in the esteemed Theodora's demise and accuse you of many other misdeeds. It doesn't matter whether or not their claims are true — the people hear them. Believe them. And think that they may follow your example."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下でさえ、格好のうわさの的なのです…ましてや最近保護領を継いだばかり。例えばクンラッド・ボイトヴィルの臣民は、シオドーラの死には陛下が一枚噛んでいると主張し、他にも多くの罪で陛下を非難しています。主張の真偽は重要ではありません。人民がそういったうわさを耳にし、信じ、陛下の行いをまねてもいいと考えることが問題なのです」

languages.text: “即使是您，大人，您才刚刚继承了王朝，就已经身处许多古怪谣言的漩涡中心。比如说，昆拉德·维特威尔的人声称，尊敬的西奥多拉的死与您有关，还指控您犯下了许多其他违法行为。这些人的指控是否属实并不重要，重要的是，人们听之信之，并纷纷效尤。”
languages.original_text: "Even you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, are the subject of the strangest of rumours — and you have just recently inherited your protectorate. Kunrad Voigtvir's people, for instance, claim that you had a hand in the esteemed Theodora's demise and accuse you of many other misdeeds. It doesn't matter whether or not their claims are true — the people hear them. Believe them. And think that they may follow your example."

traits.locale_text: “即使是您，大人，您才刚刚继承了王朝，就已经身处许多古怪谣言的漩涡中心。比如说，昆拉德·维特威尔的人声称，尊敬的西奥多拉的死与您有关，还指控您犯下了许多其他违法行为。这些人的指控是否属实并不重要，重要的是，人们听之信之，并纷纷效尤。”

languages.text: «Incluso sobre usted, {mf|milord|milady}, circulan unos rumores rarísimos y acaba de heredar el protectorado, como quien dice. Los allegados de Kunrad Voigtvir, por ejemplo, afirman que usted tuvo que ver en la muerte de la tan querida Theodora y {mf|le|la} acusan de otras muchas atrocidades. Por falsas que sean tales afirmaciones, la gente les presta atención, se las creen y piensan que seguirán su ejemplo».
languages.original_text: "Even you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, are the subject of the strangest of rumours — and you have just recently inherited your protectorate. Kunrad Voigtvir's people, for instance, claim that you had a hand in the esteemed Theodora's demise and accuse you of many other misdeeds. It doesn't matter whether or not their claims are true — the people hear them. Believe them. And think that they may follow your example."

traits.locale_text: «Incluso sobre usted, {mf|milord|milady}, circulan unos rumores rarísimos y acaba de heredar el protectorado, como quien dice. Los allegados de Kunrad Voigtvir, por ejemplo, afirman que usted tuvo que ver en la muerte de la tan querida Theodora y {mf|le|la} acusan de otras muchas atrocidades. Por falsas que sean tales afirmaciones, la gente les presta atención, se las creen y piensan que seguirán su ejemplo».

languages.text: « Même vous, Votre Seigneurie, êtes déjà au centre de rumeurs des plus étranges, alors que vous venez tout juste d'hériter du protectorat. Les hommes de Kunrad Voigtvir, par exemple, prétendent que n'êtes pas {mf|étranger|étrangère} à la mort de l'honorable Théodora et vous accusent de bien d'autres méfaits. Que ce soit vrai ou non, les gens du peuple entendent ces rumeurs et les croient. J'ai peur que ce faisant, ils en viennent à vous imiter. »
languages.original_text: "Even you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, are the subject of the strangest of rumours — and you have just recently inherited your protectorate. Kunrad Voigtvir's people, for instance, claim that you had a hand in the esteemed Theodora's demise and accuse you of many other misdeeds. It doesn't matter whether or not their claims are true — the people hear them. Believe them. And think that they may follow your example."

traits.locale_text: « Même vous, Votre Seigneurie, êtes déjà au centre de rumeurs des plus étranges, alors que vous venez tout juste d'hériter du protectorat. Les hommes de Kunrad Voigtvir, par exemple, prétendent que n'êtes pas {mf|étranger|étrangère} à la mort de l'honorable Théodora et vous accusent de bien d'autres méfaits. Que ce soit vrai ou non, les gens du peuple entendent ces rumeurs et les croient. J'ai peur que ce faisant, ils en viennent à vous imiter. »

languages.text: "Selbst Ihr, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, seid bereits Thema merkwürdigster Gerüchte – und dabei habt Ihr das Protektorat gerade erst geerbt. Kunrad Voigtvirs Leute behaupten zum Beispiel, ihr wärt am Untergang der geschätzten Theodora aktiv beteiligt gewesen, und werfen Euch noch viele andere Untaten vor. Es spielt keine Rolle, ob sie die Wahrheit sagen oder nicht – die Bürger hören es. Glauben es. Und denken, sie könnten Eurem Beispiel folgen."
languages.original_text: "Even you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, are the subject of the strangest of rumours — and you have just recently inherited your protectorate. Kunrad Voigtvir's people, for instance, claim that you had a hand in the esteemed Theodora's demise and accuse you of many other misdeeds. It doesn't matter whether or not their claims are true — the people hear them. Believe them. And think that they may follow your example."

traits.locale_text: "Selbst Ihr, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, seid bereits Thema merkwürdigster Gerüchte – und dabei habt Ihr das Protektorat gerade erst geerbt. Kunrad Voigtvirs Leute behaupten zum Beispiel, ihr wärt am Untergang der geschätzten Theodora aktiv beteiligt gewesen, und werfen Euch noch viele andere Untaten vor. Es spielt keine Rolle, ob sie die Wahrheit sagen oder nicht – die Bürger hören es. Glauben es. Und denken, sie könnten Eurem Beispiel folgen."

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, sizin hakkınızda bile çok acayip söylentiler dönüyor... Üstelik protektora mirasınızı henüz yeni devraldınız. Örneğin Kunrad Voigtvir'in adamları, saygın Theodora'nın ölümünde parmağınız olduğunu iddia ediyor ve sizi başka pek çok kötülükle suçluyor. İddialarının doğru olup olmadığının önemi yok... Bunlar, milletin kulağına gidiyor. Onlar da inanıp sizi örnek alabileceklerini sanıyor."
languages.original_text: "Even you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, are the subject of the strangest of rumours — and you have just recently inherited your protectorate. Kunrad Voigtvir's people, for instance, claim that you had a hand in the esteemed Theodora's demise and accuse you of many other misdeeds. It doesn't matter whether or not their claims are true — the people hear them. Believe them. And think that they may follow your example."

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, sizin hakkınızda bile çok acayip söylentiler dönüyor... Hem de siz, protektora mirasınızı henüz yeni devraldınız. Örneğin Kunrad Voigtvir'in adamları, saygın Theodora'nın ölümünde parmağınız olduğunu iddia ediyor ve sizi başka pek çok kötülükle suçluyor. Onların iddialarının doğru olup olmadığının bir önemi yok... Bunlar, milletin kulağına gidiyor. Bunlara inanıyorlar ve sizi örnek alabileceklerini sanıyorlar."
